amendment.description: To provide supplemental disaster relief assistance for agricultural losses in the State of Florida resulting from Hurricanes Charley and Frances.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3652 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 3652 proposed by Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S9202-9204; text: CR S9202) To provide supplemental disaster relief assistance for agricultural losses in the State of Florida resulting from Hurricanes Charley and Frances.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3652 proposed by Senator Nelson FL.
